task.title: French Toast
task.shortdesc: How to make some nice french toast.

context.p:
Ingredients and Materials:
1 egg
Milk
Butter
Almond Milk
Chia seeds
Agave
Coconut oil
Vanilla extract
Cinnamon
Bread
Vegan Bread
Medium Pan
Tongs
Large plastic container
Plastic spatula
Maple syrup
Recipie:
Set stove burner to medium heat (5)
Put butter in pan
Place pan on heat and add coconut oil
Crack egg into large plastic container
Get plastic tupperware container
Pour 1 cup of milk into container
Grind chia seeds and add to container
Add agave
Add cinnammon
Mix ingredients in container slightly
Place bread in mixture for 30 seconds
Place bread on pan
Cook for 4 minutes
Repeat previous three steps until you have achieved the desired amount of toast
Serve with Maple Syrup
